Hi,\n\nDo you want to speak English confidently in 6 months or less?
Can you read English but cannot speak well?
Do you feel stressed or nervous when speaking English?
Are you bored with English grammar, textbooks and classes?

You are not alone. Most English learners have the same problems.

This Readme will teach you the basic parts of the system that the Hot English Magazine application uses to train successful business leaders and government officials to speak English powerfully, confidently and successfully.


Why Are You Embarrassed By Your English Speaking?

Why can't you speak English well yet? What is the problem? The problem is the school teaching system: textbooks, grammar study, vocabulary lists and translation.
English classes prepare you for tests but they do not teach you to speak quickly, easily, and automatically.
That's why, even after many years of study, you still have trouble speaking English.


Better Results Require A Better Learning Method.

To get better results you must change the way you learn English. The Hot English Magazine system helps students speak English fluently.

You can speak English quickly, easily and automatically. You can use English to get protect your job, travel internationally, and make international friends. You can feel relaxed and strong when speaking English.

Using powerful techniques, the Hot English Magazine system trains you to think in English. Rather than using school methods, you will learn English in a natural and enjoyable way.
You will learn how to understand English instantly.
You will learn how to speak quickly, easily and automatically.

Rules of the Hot English Magazine system

This Readme teaches you the method and rules of the Hot English Magazine System. There are seven rules. Each rule teaches you a new method for learning and studying English.

When you use all seven rules, you will completely change the way you learn English. You will improve faster.
Your spoken grammar will improve faster.
You will learn new vocabulary words more easily and more quickly.
Use the rules and change the way you learn English.

Rule 1: Learn phrases, not individual words!

Did you know that the failure rate for English schools is 95%. Only 5% of students who join an English school actually learn to speak easily and naturally. Only 5%. That is a 95% failure rate.

You have probably spent a lot of time trying to memorize word lists. With Hot English Magazine you are not going to do that anymore. Why? Because vocabulary lists are a waste of time.

Yes, you heard me right! Trying to memorize individual words is not an effective way to learn. Instead, you're going to use the first rule of the Hot English Magazine method and learn phrases, not words.


Stop studying English words!

That's right, do not memorize single words. Native speakers (ex. Americans) do not learn English by remembering single words. Native speakers mostly learn phrases.

Phrases are GROUPS of words that naturally go together. In fact, when you learn phrases you learn both vocabulary and grammar— in a natural way.


Learn Vocabulary Faster

Research by Dr. James Asher shows that learning phrases is 4 times faster than learning individual words.

In other words, when you learn phrases you learn new vocabulary faster.

Also, his research found that students who learn phrases have better spoken grammar (than students who learned single words).


Better Pronunciation

Native speakers (Americans, British,..) speak in phrases, not word by word.

The rhythm of English is created by the natural pattern of pauses. Native speakers naturally pause between phrases. They speak the language in phrases, in short pieces of English.

Because they learned English mostly from phrases, their pronunciation is clear and easy to understand.

To have good pronunciation, you too must learn to speak in phrases too.

Rule 1: Always Study and Review Phrases, Not Individual Words

Never study a single, individual word. Never!

When you find a new word, always write down the other words with it. Always! When you review, always review all of the phrase,.. not just the single word.

Always study natural GROUPS of words— phrases and sentences.

We guarantee this simple change will:

Rule 2: Don't study grammar!

This is rule No. 2— and this is a big one! Are you surprised?

Rule 2 is a key part of the system that has helped business leaders, government officials, and people like you finally speak English confidently in 6 months or less!

Put away your grammar books. Grammar books are for children! Grammar rules teach you to think about English, you want to speak automatically— without thinking!

With Effortless English, you learn English without grammar study. You speak English naturally. English speaking isn't a formula you memorize— it's a skill you must use instantly and effortlessly.

So, Rule No. 2 is Don't Study Grammar!
